title: [Large-scale] Short-Term Training Program for Interprofessional Medication Therapy Experts

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and understanding of drug mechanism of action
context.additional_context: Interactive classroom design using digital tools, applying systematic instructional design based on Gagné’s model

learning_goals: Learners can explain drug treatment protocols for liver diseases with 80% accuracy
Learners can analyze virtual patient cases and develop appropriate medication treatment plans
Learners can interpret liver function test results and drug interaction evaluations
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
